description: Specialty coffee and energy drinks with customizable options

items.name: BLONDIE
items.description: Vanilla & Caramel Breve. Available hot or iced in Regular or Large sizes. Customize with milk options, syrups, and toppings.

items.name: SMOOTH SAILOR
items.description: White Chocolate & Caramel Breve. Available hot or iced in Regular or Large sizes. Customize with milk options, syrups, and toppings.

items.name: SMOOTH 7
items.description: Irish Cream & White Chocolate Breve. 260-840 CAL.

items.name: WHITE CHOCOLATE MOCHA
items.description: White Chocolate & Milk Chocolate Mocha. 280-850 CAL.

items.name: CINNAMON ROLL
items.description: Brown Sugar Cinnamon & White Chocolate Breve. 300-770 CAL.

items.name: SWEET & SALTY
items.description: Salted Caramel & White Chocolate Breve. 260-840 CAL.

items.name: 7 ENERGY
items.description: A premium energy drink created by 7 Brew! Infuse with any flavor! Available in original or sugar-free, and served Iced, Hot, or as a Chiller. 10-560 CAL.

items.name: VANILLA CHILLER
items.description: Vanilla cream base blended with ice. 380-770 CAL.

items.name: CHOCOLATE CHILLER
items.description: Chocolate cream base blended with ice. 390-780 CAL.

items.name: STRAWBERRY CHILLER
items.description: Strawberry cream base blended with ice. 370-760 CAL.

items.name: BLUE RASPBERRY REFRESHER
items.description: Blue raspberry flavored refreshing drink. 190-380 CAL.

items.name: EXTRA SHOT
items.description: Add an extra shot of espresso. 5 CAL.

notes: All coffee drinks can be customized with your choice of milk (Whole, Skim, Oat, Almond, Soy) and temperature (Hot, Iced). Prices shown are for Regular size.
